item.title: PDP, NNPP, LP, PRP Supporters Defect To APC In Abuja
item.description: In a significant political shift, supporters of various opposition parties including the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP), Labour Party (LP), and Peoples Redemption Party (PRP) have officially abandoned their affiliations to join the All Progressives Congress (APC). The defection ceremony, which took place at the Unity Fountain in Abuja on Thursday, showcased the former opposition party members renouncing their previous political loyalties by discarding their membership and identity cards, marking their transition to the APC.

item.title: Real Reason For High Rate Of Divorce In Entertainment Industry Nedu Opens Up
item.description: Nollywood actor and media personality, Chinedu Ani Emmanuel, popularly known as Nedu, has expressed his views on the elevated rate of divorce within the Nigerian entertainment industry. According to the comedian, the primary cause of the frequent breakdown of celebrity marriages is the absence of peace within these unions. Nedu asserted his belief that mental well-being constitutes a valid reason for divorce. He emphasized that if marriage becomes a hindrance to one’s happiness, opting for divorce is a reasonable choice.

item.title: Scarlett Johansson - Edad, Familia, Biografa

Luego protagonizó películas como The Prestige, Vicky Cristina Barcelona, Don Jon, We Bought a Zoo y Under the Skin, entre otras. Además, fue seleccionada para interpretar a la superheroína Black Widow en el Universo Cinematográfico de Marvel.  Antes de la Fama Hizo su debut cinematográfico a los nueve años de edad en la película North.

item.title: Tunde Obe Shares Secret Of 35 Years Friendship, 25 Years Marriage With Wife
item.description: In the wake of the crashed marriage confirmation of Nollywood actress, Ireti and Patrick Doyle, Nigerian singer, Tunde Obe, has shared the secret of his marriage with his wife, Wunmi. Naija News reports that this is coming a few months to the 25th wedding anniversary of the couple. Taking to the microblogging platform, Twitter, Tunde Obe offered a piece of advice to couples and other singles. According to the father of three, no relationship is perfect and the secret to a long-lasting marriage is based on the decision of the husband and wife who had agreed to stay together amidst circumstances.

item.title: APC National Convention To Hold In February 2022
item.description: Amid the crisis rocking the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC), the leadership of the party has fixed its National convention for February 2022. Naija News reports that the Chairman of the Progressive Governors Forum, and Governor of Kebbi State, Atiku Bagudu, made this known on Monday. Speaking to State House correspondents after a meeting with President Muhammadu Buhari at the Presidential Villa, Abuja, Bagudu said a committee for the convention will be set up very soon.

item.title: Chance The Rapper - Age, Family, Bio

item.title: What Games Will Be on PlayStation Mobile?
item.description: PlayStation Is Looking to Launch Mobile Games — Here's What's ComingBy Sara BelcherPublished Aug. 29 2022, 10:09 p.m. ET Source: SonyThough it's still incredibly hard to get your hands on a PlayStation 5, that hasn't stopped Sony from its reign as one of the premiere video game companies on the market right now. With multiple award-winning AAA console exclusives, PlayStation is a well-loved gaming platform. While Sony has previously made many of its famous titles exclusive to its elusive consoles, the company has announced that it will soon venture into mobile gaming.

item.title: What Happened to @Donelij on TikTok, and Why Was He Banned?
item.description: Donelij Was Banned From TikTok After Posting Allegedly Homophobic ContentBy Sara BelcherUpdated Sept. 2 2020, 5:07 p.m. ET Source: InstagramAt his peak, TikTok user @Donelij (whose real name is Chris) had 2.5 million followers. Much of his content consisted of reactions to other creators' videos, reacting either positively or negatively to the video based on his facial expressions. He usually wouldn't comment further on the video, leaving only his facial expressions to indicate his approval.

item.title: FG Assures No Delay In Paying July Salaries
item.description: The Accountant General of the Federation, Oluwatoyin Madein, reassured on Tuesday that July 2023 salaries for civil servants will not be delayed. The promise comes in the wake of previous delays in the payment of May and June 2023 salaries. Madein clarified the situation during a conversation with journalists in Abuja. She explained that the previous delays were due to unforeseen difficulties outside the control of the Office of the Accountant General.

item.title: Bandits Kill 11, Injure Three In Katsina Village
item.description: Bandits have killed not less than eleven persons, while three others sustained injuries in Tsatskiya town, Safana Local Government Area of ​​Katsina State on Saturday. It was gathered that three injured persons are receiving treatment at Dutsin-Ma General Hospital. The attackers invaded the town around 9:30 am. There are claims that there was reprisal over the killing of their informant by the residents. There are reports that four days before the attack, villagers had identified and killed an informant who was working for the bandits.

item.title: Barcelona, Leeds United Agree On Raphinha Five-Year-Contract
item.description: Spanish top football club, Barcelona has confirmed talks with Leeds United to sign Brazilian player, Raphinha. The Catalans announced in a post on their official website on Wednesday that an agreement has been reached with the English football club for the transfer of their 25-year-old midfielder. Barcelona, however, noted that the deal will be completed after the player passes his medicals. Naija News understands that Barcelona splashed the sum of 55 million euros with a potential 15 million euros in add-ons to land a five-year contract deal for Raphinha.

item.title: ODM dismisses reports on Namwamba's replacement

item.title: Osinbajo surprises staff at Murtala Muhammed Airport with unscheduled visit
item.description: Acting President Yemi Osinbajo caused panic among staff of the various agencies manning the Murtala Muhammed International Airport, Lagos, when he suddenly appeared to have first-hand knowledge of installed facilities. Osinbajo’s visit to the airport is coming just days after he began a 60-day move, through the Presidential Enabling Business Environment Council (PEBEC) he chairs, to strengthen the Nigerian economy. READ ALSO: Osinbajo launches 60-day plan to boost economy Accompanied by Hadi Sirika, the minister of state for Aviation, acting president was said to have found out that the carousels in the arrival hall were not functioning.

item.description: Online streaming is taking centre stage in the consumption of live sporting content. Today, you can watch any sporting event in high definition as long as you have a good internet connection. item.title: Benue APC Debunk Guber Primaries Nullification, Says It's Fake News
item.description: Benue state chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) on Monday debunked the publication circulating on the social media that the governorship appeal panel of the APC for the state has nullified the primaries. The party’s state Publicity Secretary Daniel Ihomun, in a statement, described the report as fake, malicious and contorted. The statement said an appeal panel by a political party lacks the power to cancel any primary election, so the purported report is fake and has no substance.

item.title: Stop Using Us For Your Campaigns
item.description: The proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) has accused former Imo State Governor, Rochas Okorocha of using the group’s name for political publicity. IPOB however warned the presidential aspirant and other politicians like him to stop dragging the group’s name into their politics. A statement on Wednesday by IPOB spokesperson, Emma Powerful particularly described Okorocha as one of the most unfortunate things to happen to Imo State lambasting him as a hypocrite and selfish political fraudster.

item.title: Tension As Ekiti Assembly Holds Plenary Under Tight Security
item.description: Armed policemen and other security operatives, on Monday, were seen around the Ekiti State House of Assembly as lawmakers hold a closed-door plenary session. Naija News learned that the stern-looking security operatives barred both journalists and other visitors from gaining entry into the assembly complex. Some politicians were also seen in groups around the complex discussing the leadership tussle rocking the state assembly. This development comes days after an attempt by some hoodlums to burn down the Ekiti assembly on Friday.

item.title: Crisis Persists As Court Throws Soludo Out Declares Umeoji APGA Governorship Candidate
item.description: The High Court sitting in Owerri, on Thursday ruled in favour of Chukwuma Umeoji as the governorship candidate of the All Progressives Grand Alliance in Anambra State. The court also directed the Independent National Electoral Commission to recongize the Owerri Convention that produced Jude Okeke as the Chairman of the party. The court struck out the suit filed by Victor Oye asking it to stop the electoral body from recognizing and publishing the name of Umeoji as the candidate of the party in the forthcoming election.

item.description: The All Progressives Congress (APC) campaign council on Sunday chided the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar over his recent comment about the 2023 presidency. Naija News recalls Atiku on Saturday during an interactive session with Arewa Joint Committee at the Arewa House in Kaduna State, said the North only needs someone from the region as the next President. Speaking at the event, the PDP candidate said Northerners need to vote for him rather than a Yoruba or Igbo candidate because he’s a Pan-Nigerian with a northern extraction that has built bridges across the country.

item.title: Ortom Speaks On Supporting Atiku In 2023 Presidential Election
item.description: The Governor of Benue State, Samuel Ortom on Thursday evening gave his take on supporting the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party, Atiku Abubakar in the 2023 general elections. Ortom when asked during an interview on Channels TV on Thursday if he would support Atiku, said, ” for now, the party’s decision is supreme, once the party takes decision what else do we have to do.” The PDP chieftain who had condemned the former vice president on how he handled the selection of his running mate said he is into hibernation.

item.description: The planet Mercury rules the Gemini sign, but because you are born in the third Decan, or part, of the sign, you are also influenced by the planet Uranus. item.title: Enenche Conniving With DSS To Detain Protesters Sowore
item.description: Senior Pastor of Dunamis International Gospel Centre, Dr Paul Enenche, has been accused of conniving with operatives of the Department of state security services, DSS to detain arrested #BuhariMustGo protesters. Former presidential aspirant and Publisher of Sahara Reporters, Omoyele Sowore in a post on his social media, alleged that the Abuja-based clergy and DSS knew the whereabouts of the arrested protesters. Sowore on his Facebook page wrote: “Dr. Paul Enenche of Dunamis International Gospel Centre is in bed with the Muhammadu Buhari tyrannical regime, he was one of the people honouring the Twitter ban, he’s not tweeted since the regime banned Twitter.

item.title: President Buhari Leaves Nigeria For UK Medical Check Up
item.description: Nigeria’s President, Muhammadu Buhari on Tuesday afternoon, departed the shores of Nigeria for London, the United Kingdom through the Abuja International Airport. The President departed the country in one of the jets available in the presidential fleet, Naija News understands. Buhari is not expected back in the country until the second week in April according to an earlier statement by his spokesperson, Femi Adesina on Monday when he announced the president’s trip to Nigerians.

item.title: We Are In A Bad Situation, Nigeria May Cease To Exist In 10 Years
item.description: Senator Gabriel Suswam (PDP-Benue Northeast) has stated that Nigeria is in a bad situation, stressing that no one knows when the country will get out of it. The former Benue governor said that the country is drifting apart and in need of a “new change.” According to the lawmaker, Nigeria may cease to exist in another 10 years if the country is not rescued from its present condition.

But the ruling party, in a statement on Tuesday, alleged that opposition parties were masterminds of the recent protests in Kano and Minna.

item.title: Pablo Picasso - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: 20th-century painter and sculptor who co-founded the Cubist movement and co-invented several new styles of art, including constructed sculpture, collage, and the plastic arts. Before Fame He displayed an artistic talent for realism during his youth, but his style changed in the early 1900s, leading him to create cubist works such as Les Demoiselles d'Avignon in 1907 and Guernica in 1937. Trivia His artistic life was divided into several periods: the Blue Period from 1901 until 1904; the Rose Period from 1904 until 1906; the African-influenced Period from 1907 until 1909; Analytic Cubism from 1909 until 1912; and Synthetic Cubism from 1912 until 1919.

item.title: What Happened to John Wes Townley? Details on the Former NASCAR Driver
item.description: Former NASCAR Driver John Wes Townley Passed Away at Just 31 Years OldBy Chris BarillaPublished Oct. 4 2021, 11:45 a.m. ET Source: FacebookThrough competing for a decade in professional racing circuits such as the Camping World Truck Series, John Wes Townley became synonymous with NASCAR as a whole. His yellow Zaxby's-branded car was a staple of the racetrack and his unique style of racing earned him the respect of some of the biggest names in the sport.

item.title: April Ross - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: American beach volleyball player who won a gold medal at the 2009 Swatch FIVB World Championships and silver at the 2012 Summer Olympics representing the United States. She was awarded a gold medal at the 2020 Summer Olympics in Tokyo. She won back-to-back NCAA titles in her last two years at the University of Southern California. Before Fame She grew up in Newport Beach, California and won the Gatorade National Player of the Year award as a senior at Newport Harbor High School.

item.title: Christopher O'Neill - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Husband of Princess Madeleine of Sweden. Also a businessman, he worked for Noster Capital, Steinberg Asset Management, and NM Rothschild and Sons. Before Fame He studied International Relations at Boston University and went on to earn his MBA from Columbia University. Trivia In the summer of 2013, he was presented with the Swedish Royal Order of the Polar Star by his father-in-law, King Carl XVI Gustaf.  Family Life He grew up in England and Switzerland as the son of American banker Paul Cesario O'Neill and Austrian citizen Eva Maria Walter.

item.title: Hayden Panettiere - Age, Family, Bio
National Assembly To Submit Resolution On Declaration Of Bandits As Terrorists To Buhari Next Week
item.description: The National Assembly on Thursday expressed its readiness to push for bandit terrorists invading and killing innocent Nigeria to be proscribed as a terrorist group. The lawmakers revealed that its resolution will be forwarded to the Secretary to the Government of the Federation, Boss Mustapha, asking President Muhammadu Buhari to declare bandits as terrorists. This is coming after former lawmaker representing Kaduna Central, Shehu Sani, accused bandits of attacking Abuja-Kaduna train he boarded after planting explosives on the railway.

item.title: Victor Osimhen May Miss Nigeria's World Cup Qualifiers In November
item.description: Super Eagles and Napoli striker, Victor Osimhen will likely not play in November’s World Cup qualifying matches against Lesotho and Zimbabwe due to fitness issues. On November 17, at the Godswill Akpabio stadium in Uyo, the three-time African champions will host the Lesotho Crocodiles before traveling to play Zimbabwe four days later. These two games could go down without Victor Osimhen. Recall that during the friendly game between the Super Eagles of Nigeria and Saudi Arabia which ended in a 2-2 draw on Friday, October 13, Victor Osimhen had to limp off the pitch in the 56th minute.

item.title: Abenny Jachiga: Huzuni yatanda katika safari ya mwisho ya msanii wa Ohangla
item.description: Hali ya majonzi ilisheheni eneo la East Ekolwa, kaunti ya Kisumu wakati wa msafara wake marehemu msanii wa Ohangla Benard Onyango Obonyo maarufu kama Abenny Jachiga uliwasili kwa mazishi yake. Mamia ya waombolezaji kutoka kaunti hiyo walijitokeza kutoa heshima zao za mwisho kwa msanii huyo mwenye umri wa miaka 33 aliyejijengea jina kutokana na uhodari wake katika muziki. Habari Nyingine: Kifo cha Nkurunziza: Bendera kupepea nusu mlingoti Msafara uliosafirisha mwili wa marehemu Abenny ulikuwa chini ya ulinzi mkali wa polisi ambao waliwazuia wakazi kulikaribia jeneza la mwenda zake.

item.title: Bailey Stender - Age, Family, Bio
Best friendship poems to send to your bff
item.description: Friendship is one of the most precious bonds that people share. However, no matter how strong these bonds are, it is crucial to make continuous efforts to remind your friends that they are treasured. One of the best ways of keeping such relationships healthy and thriving is to send friendship poems to your pals. The result will amaze you. Every relationship is unique. Therefore, you should choose the lines that suit your situation the best.

item.title: Doreen Moracha Says Babu wa Loliondo Made Her Believe She Was HIV Free for 2 years
item.description: Doreen Moracha was born with HIV and growing up with the condition, she was stigmatised most of her life, which led to her not pursuing her career Desperate to turn her life around after clearing her secondary education, Moracha turned to herbal treatment in the hope that she would be cured of the diseaseShe joined the masses that had flocked to Loliondo to drink a herbal medicine that was being offered by the traditional healerIt was after this trip that she stopped taking her ARV medication in the belief that she had been healedPAY ATTENTION: Help us change more lives, join TUKO.

item.title: Fani-Kayode, Zulum, Pantami, Matawalle, Others Storm Kano For Buhari Son's Wedding [Photos]
item.description: All is now set for the wedding Fatiha of President Muhammadu Buhari’s son, Yusuf and his bride-to-be Zahra. Naija News reports that the wedding between Yusuf and and Emir Ado Bayero’s daughter is set to hold today, Friday, in Kano. In a post on his social media handle, Femi Fani-Kayode revealed that he had joined other notable dignitaries in storming the ancient city. Fani-Kayode was seen alongside Governor Babagana Zulum of Borno, Governor Bello Matawalle of Zamfara, the Minister of Communication and Digital economy, Isa Pantami among other eminent Nigerians.

The gist: Tiffany Gomas went viral after being kicked off a plane for screaming about someone on the plane not being real. item.title: Jayden Prasad - Age, Family, Bio
Joyce Jones - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Mother of singer-songwriter Kandi Burruss. She has appeared on The Real Housewives of Atlanta, where she is known as Mama Joyce. Before Fame She was a telecommunications professional.  Trivia There has been friction between her and her son-in-law Todd Tucker. Family Life Her ex-husband is named Reverend Titus Burruss Jr. Her son Patrick was killed in a car accident at the age of 22. Her granddaughter is Riley Burruss. Associated With Her daughter's RHOA costars include Kenya Moore, Marlo Hampton and Sheree Whitfield.

item.title: Julian Dennison - Edad, Familia, Biografa
item.description: Acerca De Ganador del Premio Cinematográfico de Nueva Zelanda por su película debut del 2013 titulada Shopping. También se hizo famoso por sus papeles protagónicos en Paper Planes en el 2015 y Hunt for the Wilderpeople en el 2016. Antes de la Fama Debutó en el cine después de que una sesión de casting se llevara a cabo en su escuela. Curiosidades Apareció como él mismo en un episodio del 2016 de Home & Family.

item.title: Kathiani: Vipusa wawili wazua kisanga kulimania mwanamume
item.description: Kisanga kilitokea katika eneo la Kathiani, Machakos baada ya vipusa wawili nusra waangushane ndani ya kisima mmoja wao alipomlaumu mwenzake kwa kumpokonya mume. Inasemekana wawili hao waliamua kusuluhisha mzozo wao kwa kuzabana makonde hadharani kabla ya wanakijiji kuwatenganisha. Habari Nyingine: Chelsea wakaba koo Newcastle United nyumbani na kupaa hadi nafasi ya 4 EPL Kulingana na Taifa Leo, mrembo aliyelaumiwa alisemekana kutoka Nairobi hivi majuzi baada ya kufutwa kazi na alipowasili kijijini mwenzake alidai alikuwa akimmezea mate mumewe kwa kumpigia simu hadi hata usiku.

item.title: Labour Takes Fresh Decision Over Minimum Wage
item.description: As Nigeria grapples with soaring inflation and escalating costs of living, organised Labour, led by the Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC), has proposed a bold N500,000 minimum wage for Nigerian workers. This development comes as zonal public hearings on the new wage structure kick off today across six geopolitical zones, including Lagos, Kano, Enugu, Akwa Ibom, Adamawa, and Abuja. In a recent interview on Arise TV, Joe Ajaero, the President of the NLC, hinted at the possibility of pushing for a minimum wage as high as N1 million, should the current inflationary trends persist.

item.title: Latest Political News In Nigeria For Today, Tuesday, 11th October, 2022
item.description: Welcome to the round-up of the latest political news in Nigeria, political gist, highlights of political events, and happenings in Nigeria for today Tuesday, 11th October 2022. Read all the major political news, political event highlights, and happenings in Nigeria for today on a single page right here. Atiku: “It’s Very Selfish, Wrong, And Bad For Politics” – PDP Chieftain Knocks Wike A former Majority Leader of the Edo State House of Assembly, Matthew Iduoriyekemwen has knocked the decision of the Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike not to support the campaigns of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar.

item.title: Leisel Jones - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Former Olympic swimmer from Australia widely considered one of the greatest breaststroke swimmers of all time. She won three gold medals, five silver medals, and one bronze medal during her elite Olympic career. Before Fame She was coached by renowned swim coach Ken Wood. Trivia In 2012, she became the first Australian swimmer to swim at four Olympic Games. Family Life She was previously engaged to Australian rules footballer Marty Pask.

item.title: Lunay - Age, Family, Bio
Man Sees His Own Picture at an Anti-Vaxx Vigil for Dead Children
item.description: Vaccine Advocate Sees a Picture of Himself at an Anti-Vaxx Vigil for Dead ChildrenBy Robin ZlotnickUpdated Sept. 17 2019, 1:01 p.m. ET Source: Instagram / TwitterEthan Lindenberger made headlines some months ago when he took to Reddit to ask for advice about defying his anti-vaxx parents. He had just turned 18, done his own research, and realized that his parents were misinformed and putting him in harms' way by refusing to get him vaccinated.

item.title: Marlene Santana - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: A digital content creator who rose to fame on her marlene2995 TikTok account, which features a unique mix of lip-sync videos, couples content, and POV-style videos. She features her family members and friends throughout her uploads. She has accumulated more than 14 million followers and 821 million likes on the platform. Before Fame She made her TikTok debut in the fall of 2020. Trivia She became popular for her comedic POV videos about dating and relationships.

item.title: Osimhen Leads Attack As Chukwueze, Sanusi Return To Starting XI
item.description: Super Eagles coach, Jose Peseiro has unveiled the starting XI for the much-anticipated final of the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) against Cote d’Ivoire. The Portuguese tactician recalled AC Milan. winger, Samuel Chukwueze, to the line-up while Zaidu Sanusi recovered from injury to make the starting XI. Moses Simon and Bright Osayi-Samuel are the players who were dropped to the bench by coach Peseiro. It is, however, the usual players on the starting line-up with Victor Osimhen leading the line while Stanley Nwabali remains the man between the sticks.

item.title: Portable Reacts As Aide Crushes Bike Man To Death In Ogun [Video]
item.description: Nigerian singer, Habeeb Okikiola popularly called Portable has distanced himself from any personal involvement in the road crash involving his aide which led to the death of a bike rider. Naija News had earlier reported that the sad incident happened at the Iyano Ilogbo area of Ogun State on Tuesday. It was gathered that Portable’s driver was on his way to the naming ceremony of his boss’ second child when the tragic incident occurred.

item.title: Rozonda Thomas - Age, Family, Bio
Scores Kidnapped As Bandits Attack Commuters On Kaduna-Zaria Road
item.description: Unknown gunmen suspected to be bandits reportedly abducted scores of commuters on Thursday along the Kaduna-Zaria road. Naija News reports that the incident was confirmed in a statement made available to newsmen today by Director of Army Public Relations, Brigadier-General Onyema Nwachukwu. In his report, the army general noted that the assailants ambushed the commuters today around foundation general area within Birnin Yero Ward and whisked away an unverified number of people.

item.title: Super Eagles Striker, Odion Ighalo May Miss AFCON 2021 Tournament
item.description: Saudi Arabia Pro League side, Al Shabab has reportedly refused to allow Odion Ighalo to participate in the 2021 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) starting on January 9, 2022. Naija News reports that the striker returned to the national team in November last year after announcing his retirement from international football in 2019. The Super Eagles striker has been in good form for his club, scoring in Al Shabab’s 4-3 win over Al-Ahli Saudi on Saturday.

item.title: Tom Hulce - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Broadway actor who played Pinto in National Lampoon's Animal House, and received an Oscar nomination for his portrayal of Mozart in the film Amadeus. Before Fame He wanted to become a singer when he was growing up, but decided to become an actor after his voice changed. He made his debut opposite Anthony Perkins in Equus on Broadway in 1975. Trivia He was nominated for his first Emmy Award in 1990 for his performance as civil rights activist Michael Henry Schwerner in the TV movie Murder in Mississippi.

item.title: Usha Vance's Parents Moved to the U.S. From India
item.description: J.D. Vance's Wife Usha Vance Was Born in America to Indian Immigrant ParentsUsha and J.D. met while they both studied at Yale. By Chrissy BobicPublished July 17 2024, 9:49 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesWhen Donald Trump announced his running mate for the 2024 presidential election was Ohio Sen. J.D. Vance, the people had questions. Some of them were about J.D., but others were directed toward J.D.'s wife, Usha Vance. Many want to know who Usha's parents are, as she is an Indian-American woman born and raised in the United States.

item.title: What Happens in the 'Prey' Post-Credits Scene? Details
item.description: Hulu's 'Prey' Gave Fans an Important Teaser in the End Credits That You Don't Want to MissBy Chris BarillaPublished Aug. 5 2022, 12:04 p.m. ET Source: HuluSpoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Prey. To merely say that Prey is simply a Predator spinoff doesn't give it the credit that it deserves. The Hulu flick follows the story of a well-trained Comanche warrior named Naru (Amber Midthunder) who must protect her tribe from a fierce alien predator that enjoys hunting humans for sport.

item.title: Who Is 'Too Hot to Handle's Kayla? She's a Hot Commodity
item.description: Who is Kayla in 'Too Hot to Handle' Season 4? She catches the eye of a lot of the guys in Season 4, but there's only one man for her. Spoiler alert: This article contains spoilers for Season 4, Episodes 1-5 of Too Hot to Handle. There's always one Too Hot to Handle contestant who all of the men or women go absolutely gaga over in the season premiere, and Season 4 is no different.
